name: Silver
details: Unifoodhub's silver membership offers exclusive benefits, possibly including discounts, early access, and special promotions for enhanced food-selling experiences.

name: Gold
details: Unifoodhub's gold membership provides premium food-selling privileges, such as priority support, advanced analytics, and increased visibility for sellers.

name: Platinum
details: Unifoodhub's platinum membership offers top-tier food-selling advantages, including exclusive marketing, personalized assistance, and maximum visibility for sellers on the platform.
